title: Embarked on PhD Journey
description: Officially began my PhD at ETH Zurich under the mentorship of Roger Wattenhofer.

title: Appointed Head TA
description: Became head teaching assistant for the Hands-On Deep Learning course, completely overhauling and modernizing the curriculum to make it more engaging, challenging, and relevant for students.

title: PhD Aptitude Colloquium Passed
description: Successfully passed my Aptitude Colloquium, securing my official status as a PhD student at ETH Zurich and taking the next step in my research journey.

title: DCC Paper Accepted
description: Our work, 'Conditional Hallucinations for Image Compression' is accepted at the 2025 Data Compression Conference (DCC).

title: CLIC2025 Organizing Team
description: Joined the CLIC2025 organizing team and led the human evaluation study for the challenge.

title: Mind the Gap Paper Accepted
description: Our work, 'Mind the Gap: Removing the Discretization Gap in Differentiable Logic Gate Networks', is accepted at NeurIPS2025.
